title: Feature Request: Highway Networks
body_html: First, thanks for creating such a focused, bounded, well implemented, library. It is fantastic to work with. Highway networks might be a useful feature for torch.nn. They are needed to implement papers such as Character-Aware Neural Language Models. Most libraries have an implementation. I would be willing to implement them.
body_text: First, thanks for creating such a focused, bounded, well implemented, library. It is fantastic to work with. Highway networks might be a useful feature for torch.nn. They are needed to implement papers such as Character-Aware Neural Language Models. Most libraries have an implementation. I would be willing to implement them.
body: First, thanks for creating such a focused, bounded, well implemented, library. It is fantastic to work with. Highway networks might be a useful feature for `torch.nn`. They are needed to implement papers such as [Character-Aware Neural Language Models](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1508.06615v4.pdf). Most libraries have an implementation. I would be willing to implement them.
